name: UNIX Robots
description:
The robots are relentlessly pursuing you, step for step. Cause them to collide with each other to eliminate them and provide flaming piles of metal to shield you from the others.

The keys are unusual, but made sense for keyboards decades ago.

You get points for each destroyed robots and up to 10 safe teleports can be earned. You earn safe teleports by using the wait key (w) when you are in a safe place and all remaining robots will annihilate themselves without you having to take further action.
